item.title: Bootstrapped #122: My desktop app got acquired!
item.dc:creator: Dmitry
item.description:
@SteveMcLeod very good story, thank you! Actually it’s the first time I listened to a podcast here, being a member since 2014 Old school, prefer reading and writing. BTW, I’m running my desktop app for about 18 years now; selling it did come to my mind occasionally, but not to the point where I would seriously consider it. Your story is very interesting, the emotional part, preparing to sell, handing things over - liked it all. Do you feel sort of emptiness now that you don’t have a project you’ve been running for so long?
